attributes.action: Dual the A303 for it's entire length.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This road which stretches from the M3 to Exeter (where it becomes the A30) is littered with bottlenecks which cause no end of delays for travellers using the route. Additionally, the remaining single carriageway stretches are dangerous and many serious accidents have occoured on them in recent years.
